value.0: Yes? Is there something you need?
Have I scared you off already? Oh well. Do come back once you grow yourself a backbone, my <lord/lady>.
My name is Sharwyn, and I call this city my home. I seek adventure and excitement... if you seek the same, you'd be smart to have me accompany you.
I can forgive you for not having heard of me, however. I hail most recently from Calimport... and that's a long way for even my reputation to travel. I give it another week, personally.

I am a caster of bardic magic, a master of all skills and a teller of the oldest legends... and with or without your help, I intend to achieve my own fame in my time. One day bards will sing their songs about me.
I'll follow you gladly and to the best of my ability, my <lord/lady>... provided that I have a share of the treasures and gold in our adventures.
If you wish. I'll be here, unless someone else snaps me up.
Err... you already have someone with you. It's kind of cramping my style to be adventuring with another henchman.
I'll consider lending my service if you are by yourself. In the mean time, I'll be here unless a better opportunity comes my way.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> No, I'll take my chances with another group. I'll consider it again if you are alone, however.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Perhaps you are right. Fair enough, my <lord/lady>... I am at your disposal.
Fair enough, my <lord/lady>. I am at your disposal.
It is good to see you once again. Do you have need of me?
Back again? Something I can help you with, perhaps?
Fair enough.
You think so, do you? Hmph. I'll not help where I'm not wanted, if that's what you really want.
Fair enough.
Well, off you go then. You'll find me back at the Trade of Blades, if you change your mind.
There's no real purpose of not speaking to one another, is there?
You'll not be the first to regret crossing me...
I don't feel like talking right now. Goodbye.
Who are you?
I'll be going now.
I can do that. Welcome the to the team, Sharwyn.
Fine. Forget I asked.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Please, reconsider and join us. There's enough fame and fortune for us yet.
Never mind.
I think we need to part ways.
No, never mind.
Yes, I've made up my mind.
I'd like to buy off some of the loot that you picked up.
I'd like to buy off some of the loot that you picked up.
